description:
A unique customized version of the Astray Red Frame from MOBILE SUIT GUNDAM SEED ASTRAY. It was created by Nils Nielsen, an expert in Japanese martial arts, who uses these skills when controlling this Gunpla. Its main weapons are samurai swords called Kikuichimonji and Kotetsu, which can even cut through beams.
Source: Official Website
name: Sengoku Astray Gundam
